svg.script: var parent; var rect; function go() { // Seek animation before we start tweaking things, to make sure we've // already started sampling it. document.documentElement.setCurrentTime(0.5); var anim = document.getElementById("anim"); rect = anim.parentNode; parent = rect.parentNode; parent.removeChild(rect); rect.removeChild(anim); setTimeout(reinsert, 50); // Allow time for a sample } function reinsert() { parent.appendChild(rect); document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
